description: Set to a user id to fetch that user's details and image from Microsoft Graph.
Set to a name or email of a person to search for a person in Microsoft Graph and fetch the first person's details and image.
Set to an object representing a person. Works with object from the people, users, contacts, or group, resources.
Set to an object representing a person when no user/person/contact is found in the graph.
Set the image to show for the person.
Set the presence for the person.
Set flag to fetch personImage automatically from Microsoft Graph based on the personDetails object provided by the user.
Set to initials or photo to render either display state - default is photo.

Set to control how the person is rendered. Default is avatar  avatar - show only avatar  oneline - show avatar and first line (displayName by default)  twolines - show avatar and two lines of text (displayName and mail by default)
Sets the property of the personDetails to use for the first line of text. Default is displayName.
Sets the property of the personDetails to use for the second line of text. Default is mail.
Sets the property of the personDetails to use for the third line of text. Default is jobTitle.
Set flag to display person presence - default is false.
